title: Ascendancy - Pinnacle Of Creation mp3 320k (2014)
description:
Ascendancy is a heavy metal band formed by Garrett and Ian in June of 2009 while they were only Juniors in high school. The two began writing riffs for their very first songs at the local Guitar Center. They acquired the powerful drums from Ian's brother Brodee, and a rhythmic bass sound from Tom. After long months of writing, Thomas Pinney became the new frontman and the band started playing shows.After a few months of successfully building a local fan base, creative differences strained the band and Thomas left to pursue other interests. Still frustrated and arguing, the band felt it necessary to move forward without Tom on bass, and Ascendancy was left with only three members. Adamant about carrying on, the band found new talent in Jimmy on bass, and he quickly became a vital member. After months of searching and trying out vocalists, Gustavo saw an online ad of Ascendancy and decided to audition. Weeks went by as the band cautiously tried him out, and he worked hard to earn his way into the frontman position of the band. Currently working on their first album, Ascendancy remains determined to reestablish heavy metal as a valid source of music in today's society.
Ascendancy, a heavy metal band, has just dropped their debut album "Pinnacle of Creation". After listening to the album. This album is a MUST HAVE.

Just when I thought it could not get any better, the double bass came on and made a fast song even harder. It was a metal eargasm that infiltrated my ears and thrashed my brains.
In short, I enjoyed this album from start to finish.
